pairloop Module¶

class pairloop.PairLoopRapaport(N, domain, positions, potential, dat_dict)[source]¶

Bases: pairloop._base

Class to implement rapaport 14 cell looping.

Parameters:
  • N (int) – Number of elements to loop over.
  • domain (domain) – Domain containing the particles.
  • positions (dat) – Postitions of particles.
  • potential (potential) – Potential between particles.
  • dat_dict (dict) – Dictonary mapping between state vars and kernel vars.
execute()[source]¶

C version of the pair_locate: Loop over all cells update accelerations and potential engery.

class pairloop.SingleAllParticleLoop(N, kernel, particle_dat_dict, headers=None)[source]¶

Class to loop over all particles once.

Parameters:
  • N (int) – Number of elements to loop over.
  • kernel (kernel) – Kernel to apply at each element.
  • particle_dat_dict (dict) – Dictonary storing map between kernel variables and state variables.
  • headers (list) – list containing C headers required by kernel.
execute()[source]¶

Execute the kernel over all particle pairs.

hexdigest()[source]¶

Create unique hex digest

class pairloop.SingleAllParticleLoopOpenMP(N, kernel, particle_dat_dict, headers=None)[source]¶

Bases: pairloop.SingleAllParticleLoop

OpenMP version of single pass pair loop (experimental)
